views.markdown:
Compatible with iOS 9 and 10?

Show FLEX on SB w/o respringing!

If you use FLEX a lot like me, you may have the bad habit of automatically closing it because you have it running in almost every app. With this activator plugin even if you dismiss FLEX from SB you don't have to worry about respringing, simply assign an activator event to Show FLEX and you'll be good to go.

Configure options from Settings.
